title: Philosophy_collection_mostly_post_kant
description:
Welcome to these texts (in various formats). Focussing on Kant and afterwards. Mutiple works by most authors listed below; last is a listing of single author/titles.
Sorry about the .zip, maybe search Philosophy_holdings.txt to check if therein is that which you desire... Enjoy
